message: @schrodingercat mentioned the show Sports Night the other day on Twitter. While that isn't available for streaming, another great show by Aaron Sorkin is: Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip. That's what I've been watching for the past few days.
I'm FINALLY getting around to Man on Wire. I haven't watched much Netflix lately...though I'm remedying that today.
X-Files, Mythbusters, Kids in the Hall, Ghost Adventures! haha

I like how more and more movies from my 500 entry dvd queue are getting the play button, the good ones too. Bottle Shock was fun and easy to watch. Also enjoyed The Big Sleep, Bugsy and A Man Named Pearl.  Man on Wire was rich, unbelievable yet so French!
I've gone rogue and cancelled my Netflix.
Oh man....we watch just about everything on Netflix. I've really gotten into the anime sections while @mistahsnart has been watching the original "V" series lately.
I just finished watching 24 on Netflix.
also am working my way though the whole The Girl with/who ______________________ series...
watched Sans Solei the other night... pretty good flick in the same vein as Koyaanisqatsi...
Not on Netflix but I started watching Band of Brothers.
@georgalis I've had Bottle Shock in my queue for a while, I'm going to have to hit play on that one soon.
@theaaronc Bottle Shock is AWESOME.

@pointpointclick I helped on a film about Chris Marker a while back… I think Sans Soleil is an astonishingly crafted and totally ingenious film. For myself, I just recently finished the Battlestar Galactica series for the first time… thanks Netflix (it was a pain in the ass trying to torrent that show)!
We should bring back the Pownce Movie Club.  Convore would be a great platform for that.
@schrodingercat Band of Brothers was really well done.

Watched Rosemary's Baby again last night, timeless classic. And probably the only flick I would describe as sexy horror. Most chicks hate it, any girls that like it, please let me know. I want to meet you! >:-}
Dangerous Beauty: 16th-century Venice, join a convent or become a courtesan???
anyone else have google tv?
I wish
Been watching Gamer, but TiVo Netflix streaming seems to be acting up. Keeps freezing. May move to the Apple TV downstairs
FYI: Cagney & Lacey is now on Instant Watch. You're welcome.
Exit trough the gift shop
I watched Die Hard the other night.
ummm, netflix is off the net...
The Rage In Placid Lake
We just watched Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.
I don't know if it is on netflix but hobo with a shotgun is an epic movie if you like violence and good plot
Area 51 documentaries!
@park was gamer any good? wife wants to watch it for michael c hall, but it doesn't really look any good.
Netflix added  a bunch of Japanese anime recently - we're working our way through some new-to-us titles...
Rembrandt's J'accuse is pretty good if you enjoy suspense, social politics and painting; and don't mind a deep think. It's too much to get in one viewing, I've seen it like 3 times.
@phntm42 My buddy said Gamer wasn't too bad if you go in knowing what to expect.
